title: CS564 - Database Management Systems: Design and Implementation
body:
How hard was the class for those who took it? I'm thinking about taking the class in fall so I'm interested in knowing the difficulty and what the typical coursework breakdown looks like :)

Thanks in advance!
comments: One of the easiest upper level systems courses despite being 4 credits. It’s pretty watered down

I took it in the Fall and it wasn't bad at all. All of the assignments were done with a three-person group, so it's easy enough to split up the workload and make it incredibly manageable for a four-credit class. 

If possible, **take the class with Anhai.** He is an amazing professor with some great advice for the real world.
